results.title: Comparison of ocular hypotensive effects of 3 dosages of oral atenolol.
results.text_hl: Some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ complained of tiredness during treatment periods. Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ may be useful additional therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@.

results.title: Potential use of niosomal hydrogel as an ocular delivery system for atenolol.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to prepare and characterize an effective ocular niosomal hydrogel containing 0.5% (w/v) @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ which is @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_153 @@@beta1 adrenoceptor@@@ blocker for treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@.

results.title: The beta-adrenergic blocking agents and the treatment of glaucoma.
results.text_hl: Autonomic agents used in the treatment of @DISEASE_Ocular_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D009798 @@@ocular hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@ include @CHEMICAL_Pilocarpine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010862 @@@pilocarpine@@@, a chilinergic agonist, @CHEMICAL_Epinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004837 @@@epinephrine@@@, an adrenergic agonist, and various beta adrenergic blockers or antagonists including @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Timolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013999 @@@timolol@@@.

results.title: Defining the chronic impacts of atenolol on embryo-larval development and reproduction in the fathead minnow (Pimephales promelas).
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ is a beta-adrenergic receptor antagonist ('beta-blocker') widely used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@high blood pressure@@@ and other related conditions.
